message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly a game-changer in its field, and I believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Given its value, I would like to propose a price of $15,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I agree your product looks promising, $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $7,000 to make this work.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering both our positions.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  To be honest, $12,000 is still more than I'm comfortable with.  Would you consider $9,000?

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the negotiation so far, I am willing to accept $9,500 for the product. This is a reasonable price given its value to you and my costs. I hope we can come to an agreement.
